meanings.definition: The act of expanding beyond normal limits or boundaries.
meanings.sent1: The overexpansion of the balloon caused it to burst.
meanings.sent2: The company's rapid overexpansion led to financial difficulties.
meanings.sent3: The overexpansion of the cake batter made it overflow in the oven.
meanings.sent4: Her overexpansion of the story turned it into a tall tale.
meanings.sent5: The overexpansion of the city skyline was breathtaking.

meanings.definition: The state of being excessively expanded or enlarged.
meanings.sent1: The overexpansion of the budget resulted in a deficit.
meanings.sent2: The overexpansion of the waistband made the pants too tight.
meanings.sent3: The overexpansion of the balloon made it comically large.
meanings.sent4: The overexpansion of the rumor mill distorted the truth.
meanings.sent5: The overexpansion of the population strained resources.
